definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Use agreed-upon acceptance tests to increase your confidence prior to hand-off.
sentences.chinese: 在放手之前，使用商定的验收测试来增加您的信心。

sentences.english: An example of acceptance test report is presented in the next sections.
sentences.chinese: 在以下章节中将会给出验收测试报告的例子。

sentences.english: Collaborate with testers to finalize the acceptance criteria list for each story.
sentences.chinese: 与测试人员协作，最后确定每个故事的验收标准清单。

sentences.english: This exposure does not interfere with unit or acceptance tester objectives.
sentences.chinese: 这种接触没有干涉单元或者验收测试目标。

sentences.english: The checking and accepting standards of Hydrological Data Acquisition System (HDAS) construction vary with its work mode.
sentences.chinese: 水文遥测系统工作制式不同，系统的验收标准也不同。

sentences.english: City Planning Board for planning permission and acceptance without formalities.
sentences.chinese: 其中市规划局将不予为其办理规划许可和验收手续。

sentences.english: Code for engineering design of generic cabling System for building …
sentences.chinese: 建筑与建筑群综合布线系统工程验收规范。

sentences.english: The project manager draws it up during the Inception phase of the project.
sentences.chinese: 项目经理在项目的先启阶段开始编写产品验收计划。

sentences.english: Transport them to Lianyungang Branch, and take the general installation and final inspection there.
sentences.chinese: 最终运往连云港分公司进行总体装配和最终验收。
第三十条子项目延期验收。

sentences.english: Acceptance testing equipment for production of liquid propellant.
sentences.chinese: 生产液体推进剂用的验收试验设备。

sentences.english: Sanity acceptance testing for every build, integration point, or iteration.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个构建，集成点，或迭代的全面验收测试。

sentences.english: Second, run your acceptance tests under a code coverage tool.
sentences.chinese: 其次，使用代码覆盖工具运行您的验收试验。

sentences.english: In charge of checking and accepting for all utility equipments or machines to be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 负责动力设备零备件及材料计划，到货验收及保管。

sentences.english: Certificate of acceptance of contract product quality signed by both parties in two copies.
sentences.chinese: 由双方签署的合同产品考核验收合格证书一式两份。

sentences.english: This Joint ex-works checking can NOT replace Final Acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 该检验不能取代设备到达现场落后行的验收。

definition: to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to report for judgment/to submit for approval
to finish work/to complete a project
construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to act with self-restraint/to examine oneself/to perform a self-test
random inspection/to do a spot check
